sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import {
  View,
  Text,
  StyleSheet,
  ScrollView,
  TouchableOpacity,
  Dimensions,
  Alert,
  Share,
} from 'react-native';
import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
import { useSafeAreaInsets } from 'react-native-safe-area-context';
import { useTheme } from '../contexts/ThemeContext';
import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext';
import Header from '../components/Header';

const HomeScreen = ({ navigation }) => {
  const insets = useSafeAreaInsets();
  const { width: screenWidth } = Dimensions.get('window');
  const { theme } = useTheme();
  const { t } = useLanguage();
  
  return (
    <View style={[styles.container, { paddingTop: insets.top, backgroundColor: theme.colors.background }]}>
      <ScrollView style={styles.scrollView}>
        {/* Header */}
        <Header 
          navigation={navigation}
        />

        {/* Emergency Situations Section */}
        <View style={styles.section}>
          <Text style={[styles.sectionTitle, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>{t('emergencySituations')}</Text>
          
          {/* Earthquake Alert */}
          <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.emergencyCard, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.cardBackground }]}>
            <View style={styles.emergencyIconContainer}>
              <Ionicons name="warning" size={20} color="#FF6B35" />
            </View>
            <View style={styles.emergencyContent}>
              <Text style={[styles.emergencyTitle, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>Malatya - 4.2 {t('earthquake')}</Text>
              <View style={styles.emergencyMeta}>
                <View style={styles.metaItem}>
                  <Ionicons name="location-outline" size={12} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
                  <Text style={[styles.metaText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>Malatya Merkez</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.metaItem}>
                  <Ionicons name="time-outline" size={12} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
                  <Text style={[styles.metaText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>2 {t('minutesAgo')}</Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </TouchableOpacity>

          {/* Fire Alert */}
          <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.emergencyCard, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.cardBackground }]}>
            <View style={[styles.emergencyIconContainer, { backgroundColor: '#FFE5E5' }]}>
              <Ionicons name="flame" size={20} color="#FF3B30" />
            </View>
            <View style={styles.emergencyContent}>
              <Text style={[styles.emergencyTitle, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>{t('forestFire')}</Text>
              <View style={styles.emergencyMeta}>
                <View style={styles.metaItem}>
                  <Ionicons name="location-outline" size={12} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
                  <Text style={[styles.metaText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>Antalya Manavgat</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.metaItem}>
                  <Ionicons name="time-outline" size={12} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
                  <Text style={[styles.metaText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>15 {t('minutesAgo')}</Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            </View>
          </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>

        {/* Share Information Button */}
        <TouchableOpacity 
          style={styles.shareButton}
          onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Emergency')}
        >
          <Ionicons name="add" size={20} color="#FFFFFF" />
          <Text style={styles.shareButtonText}>{t('shareInformationDesc')}</Text>
        </TouchableOpacity>

        {/* Community Posts Section */}
        <View style={styles.section}>
          <Text style={[styles.sectionTitle, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>{t('communityUpdates')}</Text>
          
          {/* Post 1 */}
          <View style={[styles.postCard, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.cardBackground }]}>
            <View style={styles.postHeader}>
              <View style={styles.postAvatar}>
                <Text style={styles.avatarText}>A</Text>
              </View>
              <View style={styles.postUserInfo}>
                <Text style={[styles.postUsername, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>AFAD</Text>
                <Text style={styles.postBadge}>Doğrulanmış</Text>
                <Text style={[styles.postTime, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>30 dakika önce</Text>
              </View>
              <TouchableOpacity style={styles.followButton}>
                <Text style={styles.followButtonText}>Eğitim</Text>
              </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
            <Text style={[styles.postContent, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>
              Deprem anında yapılması gerekenler: • Sakin kalın • Çök-Kapan-Tutun • Açık alana çıkın • Asansör kullanmayın
            </Text>
            <View style={styles.postActions}>
              <View style={styles.postStats}>
                <Ionicons name="heart-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
                <Text style={[styles.statText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>245</Text>
                <Ionicons name="chatbubble-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} style={{ marginLeft: 16 }} />
                <Text style={[styles.statText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>18</Text>
              </View>
              <TouchableOpacity>
                <Ionicons name="share-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
              </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
          </View>

          {/* Post 2 */}
          <View style={[styles.postCard, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.cardBackground }]}>
            <View style={styles.postHeader}>
              <View style={styles.postAvatar}>
                <Text style={styles.avatarText}>A</Text>
              </View>
              <View style={styles.postUserInfo}>
                <Text style={[styles.postUsername, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>Ahmet K.</Text>
                <Text style={[styles.postTime, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>1 saat önce</Text>
                <Text style={[styles.postLocation, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>Ankara</Text>
              </View>
              <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.followButton, { backgroundColor: '#34C759' }]}>
                <Text style={styles.followButtonText}>Topluluk</Text>
              </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
            <Text style={[styles.postContent, { color: theme.colors.text }]}>
              Kızılay kan bağışı kampanyası başladı. Sağlık için kan bağışı yapalım! 🩸
            </Text>
            <View style={styles.postActions}>
              <View style={styles.postStats}>
                <Ionicons name="heart-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
                <Text style={[styles.statText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>67</Text>
                <Ionicons name="chatbubble-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} style={{ marginLeft: 16 }} />
                <Text style={[styles.statText, { color: theme.colors.secondaryText }]}>12</Text>
              </View>
              <TouchableOpacity>
                <Ionicons name="share-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.secondaryText} />
              </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
          </View>
        </View>
      </ScrollView>
    </View>
  );
};

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
  container: {
    flex: 1,
    backgroundColor: '#F2F2F7',
  },
  scrollView: {
    flex: 1,
  },

  section: {
    marginTop: 16,
    paddingHorizontal: 16,
  },
  sectionTitle: {
    fontSize: 18,
    fontWeight: '600',
    color: '#000000',
    marginBottom: 12,
  },
  emergencyCard: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF',
    borderRadius: 12,
    padding: 16,
    marginBottom: 12,
    shadowColor: '#000',
    shadowOffset: {
      width: 0,
      height: 1,
    },
    shadowOpacity: 0.1,
    shadowRadius: 2,
    elevation: 2,
  },
  emergencyIconContainer: {
    width: 40,
    height: 40,
    borderRadius: 20,
    backgroundColor: '#FFF3F0',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center',
    marginRight: 12,
  },
  emergencyContent: {
    flex: 1,
  },
  emergencyTitle: {
    fontSize: 16,
    fontWeight: '600',
    color: '#000000',
    marginBottom: 8,
  },
  emergencyMeta: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    alignItems: 'center',
  },
  metaItem: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    alignItems: 'center',
    marginRight: 16,
  },
  metaText: {
    fontSize: 12,
    color: '#8E8E93',
    marginLeft: 4,
  },
  shareButton: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    backgroundColor: '#007AFF',
    borderRadius: 12,
    padding: 16,
    marginHorizontal: 16,
    marginTop: 8,
    marginBottom: 16,
  },
  shareButtonText: {
    fontSize: 16,
    fontWeight: '600',
    color: '#FFFFFF',
    marginLeft: 8,
  },
  postCard: {
    backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF',
    borderRadius: 12,
    padding: 16,
    marginBottom: 12,
    shadowColor: '#000',
    shadowOffset: {
      width: 0,
      height: 1,
    },
    shadowOpacity: 0.1,
    shadowRadius: 2,
    elevation: 2,
  },
  postHeader: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    alignItems: 'center',
    marginBottom: 12,
  },
  postAvatar: {
    width: 40,
    height: 40,
    borderRadius: 20,
    backgroundColor: '#007AFF',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center',
    marginRight: 12,
  },
  avatarText: {
    fontSize: 16,
    fontWeight: '600',
    color: '#FFFFFF',
  },
  postUserInfo: {
    flex: 1,
  },
  postUsername: {
    fontSize: 14,
    fontWeight: '600',
    color: '#000000',
  },
  postBadge: {
    fontSize: 12,
    color: '#007AFF',
    marginTop: 2,
  },
  postTime: {
    fontSize: 12,
    color: '#8E8E93',
    marginTop: 2,
  },
  postLocation: {
    fontSize: 12,
    color: '#8E8E93',
    marginTop: 2,
  },
  followButton: {
    backgroundColor: '#007AFF',
    borderRadius: 16,
    paddingHorizontal: 12,
    paddingVertical: 6,
  },
  followButtonText: {
    fontSize: 12,
    fontWeight: '600',
    color: '#FFFFFF',
  },
  postContent: {
    fontSize: 14,
    color: '#000000',
    lineHeight: 20,
    marginBottom: 12,
  },
  postActions: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    justifyContent: 'space-between',
    alignItems: 'center',
  },
  postStats: {
    flexDirection: 'row',
    alignItems: 'center',
  },
  statText: {
    fontSize: 12,
    color: '#8E8E93',
    marginLeft: 4,
  },

});

export default HomeScreen;
